languages.text: "Члены клана усопшего опасаются выступать с обвинениями к спутнице Лорд-капитана. Отважных же друзей почтенный Леттард за жизнь не завел — он всегда предпочитал работу чужой компании".

traits.locale_text: "Члены моего клана опасаются выступать с обвинениями к спутнице Лорд-капитана. Отважных же друзей я за жизнь не завел — я всегда предпочитал работу чужой компании". {n}Человек в маске пожимает плечами с великолепным равнодушием, неукоснительно играя роль Леттарда.{/n}

languages.text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."
languages.original_text: "Члены клана усопшего опасаются выступать с обвинениями к спутнице Лорд-капитана. Отважных же друзей почтенный Леттард за жизнь не завел — он всегда предпочитал работу чужой компании".

traits.locale_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

"My clan members are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And I haven't made any courageous friends in my life, having always preferred my work to the company of others." {n}The masked man shrugs with exquisite indifference.{/n}

"The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

languages.text: « Le clan auquel appartenait le défunt redoute d'accuser un membre de l'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Et vu que l'honorable Lettard a toujours préféré son travail à la compagnie des autres, il n'a pas eu l'occasion de se faire des amis qui auraient pu avoir le courage de le faire. »
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

traits.locale_text: « Le clan auquel appartenait le défunt redoute d'accuser un membre de l'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Et vu que l'honorable Lettard a toujours préféré son travail à la compagnie des autres, il n'a pas eu l'occasion de se faire des amis qui auraient pu avoir le courage de le faire. »

languages.text: «El clan del fallecido teme presentar acusaciones contra la compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Y el venerable Lettard nunca tuvo amigos valientes, habiendo preferido su trabajo a la compañía de los demás».
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

traits.locale_text: «El clan del fallecido teme presentar acusaciones contra la compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Y el venerable Lettard nunca tuvo amigos valientes, habiendo preferido su trabajo a la compañía de los demás».

languages.text: 「死亡者が所属していた一族は、ロード・キャプテンのお連れ様相手にとやかく言うのは慎重になっております。それに、名誉あるレタードは、生涯勇気ある友人を作ったことがありません。いつも他人との付き合いよりも仕事を優先していましたので」
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

traits.locale_text: 「死亡者が所属していた一族は、ロード・キャプテンのお連れ様相手にとやかく言うのは慎重になっております。それに、名誉あるレタードは、生涯勇気ある友人を作ったことがありません。いつも他人との付き合いよりも仕事を優先していましたので」

languages.text: “死者所属的氏族不愿指控舰长大人的同伴。至于尊敬的莱塔德，在他的一生中，他从来没结交过任何有胆识的朋友。他更喜欢他自己的工作，不喜欢别人的陪伴。”
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

traits.locale_text: “死者所属的氏族不愿指控舰长大人的同伴。至于尊敬的莱塔德，在他的一生中，他从来没结交过任何有胆识的朋友。他更喜欢他自己的工作，不喜欢别人的陪伴。”

languages.text: Der Clan, dem der Verstorbene angehörte, hütet sich davor, Anschuldigungen gegen den Gefährten des Lord Captains vorzubringen. Und der geschätzte Lettard hatte in seinem Leben nie mutige Freunde, da er seine Arbeit stets der Gesellschaft anderer Leute vorzog."
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."

traits.locale_text: Der Clan, dem der Verstorbene angehörte, hütet sich davor, Anschuldigungen gegen den Gefährten des Lord Captains vorzubringen. Und der geschätzte Lettard hatte in seinem Leben nie mutige Freunde, da er seine Arbeit stets der Gesellschaft anderer Leute vorzog."

languages.text: "Rahmetlinin dâhil olduğu klan, Lord Kaptan'ın yoldaşına karşı suçlama yönelttiklerinin farkında. Muhterem Lettard ise ömrü boyunca cesur tek bir arkadaş bile edinmemiş. Başkalarıyla bir arada olmaktansa her daim işini tercih etmiş."
languages.original_text: "The clan to which the deceased belonged are wary of bringing accusations against the Lord Captain's companion. And the esteemed Lettard never made any courageous friends in his life, having always preferred his work to the company of others."
